Sentencas: In the last decades, Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) have received a lot of attention due to their ability to efficiently convert hydrogen and other fuels to electricity and heat.
Titulo: Durability enhancement of novel monolithic metal supported Solid oxide fuel cells through processing optimizations

Sentencas: Cells with different designs (planar, tubular, anode-, electrolyte-, metal-supported) have been intensively studied in terms of performance, costs and lifetime.
Titulo: Durability enhancement of novel monolithic metal supported Solid oxide fuel cells through processing optimizations

Sentencas: Still, technical challenges such as limited thermal cycling stability and cost-efficient paths to up-scaling need to be solved to make the SOFC technology more commercially attractive.
Titulo: Durability enhancement of novel monolithic metal supported Solid oxide fuel cells through processing optimizations

Sentencas: This study presents the design, fabrication and testing of a novel monolithic metal-supported SOFC with the aim to achieve thermal cycling robustness and a high volumetric power density using cost -competitive and scalable manufacturing methods.
Titulo: Durability enhancement of novel monolithic metal supported Solid oxide fuel cells through processing optimizations

Sentencas: The study presents preliminary elec-trochemical performances of the cells and key parameters of the manufacturing process that were optimized to increase the stability/durability of the monolith by a factor of 100.
Titulo: Durability enhancement of novel monolithic metal supported Solid oxide fuel cells through processing optimizations
